disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Contempt for the Weak.

blurb.value: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

description.value: Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets  below 50% of their maximum health deal 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage. Against monsters, the damage is increased by 100%, but is capped at 200 / 350 / 500 (based on level).

description2.value: Contempt for the Weak can only affect the same target once every few seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The enhanced attack applies other on-hit effects and can critically strike as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect structures. Contempt for the Weak is not consumed when dodged or missed, but it is consumed when blocked. Contempt for the Weak considers the target's health upon landing the attack, not when it's declared. If the target falls below the threshold while Zed is winding up the attack, Contempt for the Weak applies, and vice versa.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Razor Shuriken.

blurb.value: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.

description.value: Active: Zed and his Shadows throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals physical damage to all enemies struck, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.

leveling.value: Physical Damage:»80 / 115 / 150 / 185 / 220 (+ 100% bonus AD)«Secondary Damage:48 / 69 / 90 / 111 / 132 (+ 60% bonus AD)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Razor Shuriken has been special cased to apply a stack of Electrocute and Phase Rush for each Shuriken hit. Spell shield only blocks the damage from one Razor Shuriken even if two hit at the same time. Shurikens blocked by spell shield still count as being hit for the reduced pass-through damage. If Zed buffers an attack command during Razor Shuriken's cast time the attack will perform slower than if Zed had attacked after the cast time. The same does not happen if Zed recasts Living Shadow during Razor Shuriken's cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Living Shadow.

blurb.value: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.

description.value: Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever a Shadow lands a mimicked ability on the same target he does. This may only happen once per cast ability.

description2.value: Active: Zed's Shadow dashes in the target direction, remaining in place for 5 seconds and being able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash while in range of each other. If an ability is cast while the Shadow is dashing, the Shadow will cast the ability at the moment of its appearance. Living Shadow can be recast at no delay for the duration. If recast while the Shadow is dashing, the recast will be buffered.

description3.value: Recast: While in range of each other, Zed and his Shadow blink to their respective locations, swapping places.

description4.value: If Living Shadow is recast during Razor Shuriken, Zed will instantly release the shuriken from his original position while still remaining in cast time, and the Shadow will release the shuriken based on Zed's remaining cast time.*

description5.value: The Shadow will cast Shadow Slash independently of being in Razor Shuriken's cast time or not.*

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. The energy refund is not granted if the mimicked ability is blocked by a spell shield. While grounded or rooted Zed can cast Living Shadow but may not swap places with it. Shadows grant sight of their surroundings (700 radius) and they are untargetable. If Zed casts Living Shadow while a non- Death Mark Shadow is already present, the previous Shadow will instantly disappear. Shadows will not disappear when Zed dies.* Casting Living Shadow and then swapping with the Death Mark Shadow allows Zed to recast Living Shadow regardless of distance for a very brief period of time.* Zed always has an arrow next to him pointing in the direction of his Shadows. It has three different colors, each one symbolizes important information about the specific Shadow. They are only visible to Zed. Two arrows point toward their corresponding Shadows. A green arrow (blue in colorblind mode) means the Shadow can be swapped places with. A yellow arrow signifies the Shadow is about to disappear. A red arrow (orange in colorblind mode) indicates the Shadow is unable to be swapped places with.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shadow Slash.

blurb.value: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy. The shadow's spin slows.

description.value: Active: Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing physical damage to enemies surrounding them.

description2.value: Enemies hit by the slash of a Shadow are slowed for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's potency is increased by 50%.

description3.value: Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's  cooldown by 2 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shields will only block one Shadow Slash if two hit at the same time, the slow will not apply regardless. Shadow Slash does not interrupt attack commands.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death Mark.

blurb.value: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

description.value: Active: Zed becomes untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he dashes through the target enemy champion over 0.4 seconds, after which he marks them, gains ghosting for 3 seconds, and becomes targetable again. Zed also spawns a Shadow of himself at his casting position upon Death Mark's activation which lasts for 7.5 seconds and is able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash while in range of Zed. Death Mark can be recast after 0.5 seconds of his reappearance.

description2.value: For the next 3 seconds, Zed stores a percentage of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his Shadows deal to the marked target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.

leveling2.value: Physical Damage:100% AD (+ 25 / 40 / 55% of damage dealt)

description3.value: Recast: Regardless of the distance between each other, Zed and the Death Mark Shadow blink to their respective locations, swapping places.

description4.value: If the target dies or is 1950 or more units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is canceled, goes on a 5 second  cooldown, and Zed reappears at the cast location.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Zed will be ordered to basic attack his target after reappearing. The debuff for the mark is named Marked for Death. Death Mark's stored damage derives from all basic attacks, abilities, items, runes and buffs. Death Mark's Shadow is functionally the same as a regular one, but it lasts longer and can be recast regardless of range. The range at which they mimic Zed's abilities do not change. The mark can be prevented by becoming untargetable before it is applied (untargetability after application will not prevent the mark's detonation). Spell shields will only block the mark's application. They will not prevent Zed from initiating the cast nor block the detonation from a mark that is already applied. If the target is 1950 units away during the dash, Zed will stop following them and only dash through their previous location. The mark is still applied. If Zed dies during Death Mark, the ability will cancel instantly and he will reappear at his current location. The cooldown is not compensated. If he enters resurrection before the dash, Death Mark does not cancel. If he enters it while dashing, the dash is interrupted. If the dash is interrupted, Zed stops, places himself to the ground (ends all displacements affecting him, but does not remove airborne effects), and reappears prematurely at his current location. The mark will still be applied regardless. Zed will remove airborne effects from himself immediately upon starting the dash. Once Zed begins the dash, two shadows of himself will also appear to be dashing through his target, each one spawning a certain distance behind the target (from the right and left). These shadows do not mimic abilities and disappear immediately after they stop dashing but they grant sight of their surroundings. Death Mark does not cancel if the target enters a zombie state before the dash begins. If the mark's post-mitigation damage is higher than the target's current health, a spinning shuriken will appear above the victim. This does not necessarily mean the target will die, as it does not consider shields or other forms of damage modifiers. The indicator shown in-game (base skin). This following table refers for interactions while Zed is in Death Mark: Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable N/A Disabled All items are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Disabled Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Mark Dash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death, unless protected by Resurrection
